The '''Sociedad Tolkien Española''' (Spanish: "Spanish Tolkien Society"), or '''STE''',  is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] based in [[wikipedia:Spain|Spain]]. 

==History==
The Society was founded in [[1991]] in [[Wikipedia:Elche|Elche]], in view of the coming [[1992|Centenary]], having the first official meeting on [[9 February]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://old.sociedadtolkien.org/texto.php?id=11|articlename=The Sociedad Tolkien Española|dated=|website=[http://www.sociedadtolkien.org/ Old web of the STE]|accessed=14 July 2019}}</ref> Its first chairman was [[José Manuel Ferrández Bru]].<ref>{{webcite|author=[[José Manuel Ferrández Bru]]|articleurl=https://www.josemanuelferrandez.com/ENindex.html|articlename=A brief biography|dated=|website=[https://www.josemanuelferrandez.com/ENindex.html JoseManuelFerrandez.com]|accessed=14 July 2019}}</ref> Although the Executive Committee and its seat is placed in a particular locality, there are many local delegations called "smials".

Ever since [[2015]], an official [[podcast]] releases monthly, called "[https://www.sociedadtolkien.org/podcast/ Regreso a Hobbiton]".

==Publications==
The Society publishes the journal ''[https://www.sociedadtolkien.org/revista-estel/ Estel]'' twice a year. As of 2023, 99 issues have been published.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.sociedadtolkien.org/blog/category/revista-estel/|articlename=Revista Estel|dated=|website=[https://www.sociedadtolkien.org SociedadTolkien.org]|accessed=10 July 2023}}</ref> 

The journal ''[https://www.sociedadtolkien.org/blog/category/publicaciones/revista-nolme/ Nolmë]'', more academic, is published irregularly.
==Awards==
Four awards are given out every year:
* "[https://www.sociedadtolkien.org/premio-de-arte-niggle/ Niggle]", artisanship award, with the categories "Pictoral arts and illustration" and "Other arts".
* "[https://www.sociedadtolkien.org/premio-ensayo-aelfwine/ Ælfwine]", essay award (open to English submissions), with the categories "Academic essay" and "Literary-humanities essay".
* "[https://www.sociedadtolkien.org/premio-relato-gandalf/ Gandalf]", story award (the oldest, awarded since 1995).
* "[https://www.sociedadtolkien.org/premios-bilbo/ Bilbo]", micro-story award.
